about_the_game:
Darkest Light is a story-driven Action-Adventure puzzle game.

As scientist Jack, you explore a rain forest in asia. You are following a lead to a mysterious machine, which left traces in different ares throughout the human history.

After your arrival in the forest, you find animals and plants with strange behaviors. It seems that the wildlife was infected by some kind of sickness. In order to pursue your mission, you have to find ways to evade them. Sometimes you might be able to lure them into a trap. Appearently some of them are affraid of light.

Luckily you meet a boy, who will guide you. And there are also a few tools you can use to survive.

From time to time people came into the forest to lift its secrets, maybe it's you who figures out what happened.

Please note that the shown screenshots are very early footage, the final product will look different.

short_description: In this Action-Adventure, instead of shooting your enemies, you have to use the environment to survive. As scientist Jack, you travel into the rain forest in search for a legendary machine. What you find is horror, but there is also one kind boy who helps to find a way through it all.
